job_description:
Job Description

"""Senior Web Application Developer:

At least 10 years of experience developing custom applications

Skilled With Web Application Development
Both client side and server side programming/debugging/optimization
Must have excellent understanding of the HTTP protocol, client-server interactions, request/response headers
Frameworks required: .NET Framework, ASP.NET Core, Angular/JS,

Languages: C#

Ability to interpret and work with complex structures and references in JSON files

Excellent T-SQL programming skills in an Microsoft SQL/ Azure SQL environment
Designing database structures tables, indexes, foreign keys
Writing complex stored procedures and SQL functions
Creating complex views and reports
Experienced with code sourcing and versioning Github (Azure Github repos), Visual Team Studio

Experience with Azure deployment pipelines and automated deployment workflows in general""

Required Skills Which Are Very Important
POWER BI
POWER apps
Facilitation experience.
